channel.title: I'm Engaged!
channel.description:
So I'm engaged to be married on August 8, 2009. I've never been so happy before in my life. I asked her to marry me at a baseball game on the scoreboard on July 5th, and now we live together. I wasn't sure how to break the news to all of my friends on here, because I don't want you guys to think that I am going to pull a kaitnieks and shut everything down, I'll never do that.
Also, my fiance said she wanted to help out with the website, because I told her about all the problems we had finding good moderators and moderating such a huge userbase. I told her to make an account, start posting and get active, and when she earned it I would make her a moderator and announce to the populace that we are engaged to each other. I was going to cover her tracks with a fake IP, but I never got around to it and Lothy found out, and then Mopman, so the cat is out of the bag and I'm posting it now.
My fiance is [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=298329]srt8[/url].
So what do you guys think? :D

item.title: I'm Engaged!
item.dc:creator: @Akisteenager32 Akisteenager32
item.description:
@Akisteenager32 wrote:

Hi. lol
So like I was visiting here, and I saw this topic so I said to myself: “Whose the one that would make MITB most happy to congratulate him?” lol so…I hope you get a happy marriage where not many troubles face you on the way.
And whilst I’m still here(hi Lothy), I hope that one day when you’re in a tower, or a building, an airplane doesn’t come and crash the building your in and kills you.

And like hi str8, and congratz. bye bye

Read full topic
